meanings.definition: A declaration or assurance that one will do a particular thing or that a particular thing will happen.
meanings.sent1: Her promises to help with the project gave us hope.
meanings.sent2: The politician's promises to improve healthcare were well-received.
meanings.sent3: The cat's promise to catch the mouse was met with skepticism.
meanings.sent4: The promises of a brighter future shone like beacons in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: His broken promises left a trail of disappointment in their wake.

meanings.definition: A reason to expect that something will happen in the future.
meanings.sent1: The dark clouds in the sky were promises of an impending storm.
meanings.sent2: The early signs of spring were promises of warmer days ahead.
meanings.sent3: The loud rumble of thunder was a promise of rain to come.
meanings.sent4: The blooming flowers were promises of a colorful season.
meanings.sent5: The distant sound of waves crashing on the shore was a promise of the ocean's presence.
